issue.title: [JS]Is there a JS ArrowFlight implementation/example?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Have requirements for building JavaScript data visualizer that connects to Dremio.  Would like to do it with ArrowFlight.  I see the Arrow JS project and have played with some of the cookbook code but don't see any ArrowFlight examples or implementations.   Am I missing something?  Any pointers would be appreciated.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13515?focusedCommentId=17391566) by David Li (lidavidm):*
There is no current Flight implementation for Arrow in JavaScript. I think this has come up a few times and the question is which transport to use (as we do not have gRPC in the browser) or whether one of the existing gRPC proxies/transcoders may suffice. If you're interested, an email to the mailing list may serve you better to gauge interest: dev@arrow.apache.org, see <https://arrow.apache.org/community/>
